titles.title: BUILD Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the national limitation amount for qualified highway or surface freight transfer facility bonds.
BUILD Act
Building United States Infrastructure and Leveraging Development Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Building United States Infrastructure and Leveraging Development Act or the BUILD Act
This bill increases from $15 billion to $30 billion the national limitation on the amount of tax-exempt highway or surface freight transfer facility bonds.
